cn.sharesdk.onekeyshare

类 OnekeyShare

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.sharesdk.framework.FakeActivity
      • cn.sharesdk.onekeyshare.OnekeyShare
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    PlatformActionListener

    public class OnekeyShare
extends FakeActivity
implements PlatformActionListener
    entrance of onekeyshare

    by setting different setter parameter, then call the Show method to start the shortcut to share
